OOC: Koj has so much honor because he is a half breed. Half Autobot and 
Decepticons thats one thing figured I'd save for later and the only member 
left of the elite Unit #0 and I have yet to show you his true power. Save 
your offer Kitkat your kind took Lilly so that in itself sign your death 
scroll.

::Koj::

Koj Laughs as they land in the CF "Well I believe everybody needs someone 
even if is only someone they can't touch them just to know they  once had 
someone there. Besides I think giving up my life for the saftey of others is 
heroic. But expecting you to throw life away for me is a driffent story. I 
think we should try to protect any life even some dark ones to create 
balance. But I believe if one person has the heart and is will to go the 
distance the loss of any life is not need. I also know if I'm captured the 
maximals will never come to save me because of my birth as a pred but that 
is unimportant the choices I make now are."


::In-Yasha::
Inu scans his data for the answers of other Dragon Masters Finding most felt 
the strong live and the weak die those who depend on others are doomed to 
fail. "Very intresting views your are the really a Dragon Master Koj."
